content: jasmine socks the sun flared through the leaves of the oak tree as it began to set there was a orange glow to the garden in the evenings that drew the three girls out of hiding into the chilly air the first sat on the decking step sock clad toes brushing through the grass jasmine blossoms woven into her hair by the second knelt behind her the second admired the braid for a moment slipping a single rose bud into the highest knot with the steadiest hand a ten-year-old could muster the third sat legs splayed in the grass miss-matched socks bunching at the ankles daisies plucked and piled in her lap she nipped a stalk with her nail and slotted the last one into place then rose to her feet to crown her oldest sister a single daisy tucked into the button of her dress 1 jasmine socks by debbie ford yarn leg length worked in sample is 16 5 cm / 6 5 inches leg and foot length are fully 1 skein / 100grams / 365m / 399 yards of adjustable fingering weight yarn pattern notes sample used magic_ring b yarn warwick mini skein set in colourway the rose collection this pattern is written for socks using a main colour and a contrast for heels and toes needles the sample is worked using a mini skein set 2 25mm / us 1 circular needle 80cm / 32 inch for magic loop or 2 25mm / us 1 set of dpn s picked one mini for cuffs heels and toes or size to obtain gauge work just 12 rounds of cuff then work two repeats of the jasmine pattern 16 rounds in gauge total in each of the other 4 colours once on the leg 64 rounds total and the same on the 32 sts and 48 row per 10cm / 4 inches over foot stockinette model wears a uk size 5-6 / 38-39 / us 7-8 notions shoe stitch markers and a tapestry needle the toe in this pattern is a modified wedge sizes toe working only 1 st between the decreases on either side i find this gives a flatter toe small medium large eliminating the excess fabric on the top finished sock circumference unstretched 18 sometimes found 20 5 23 cm / 7 8 9 inches i would here is a link to my weaving in ends as you recommend picking a size that gives you 1 25 go tutorial https //youtu be/qif5jpllfqk cm to 2 5 cm / 0 5 to 1 inch of negative ease model is wearing a medium size with a foot circumference of 22 cm / 8 5 inches stockinette charted and written instructions instructions are on page 4 and 5 cuff round 1 k2 1 3 work row 1 of jasmine both socks are worked the same pattern k2 1 3 knit to end of round cast on 56 64 72 sts join in the round round 2 k2 1
